title: 2018–19 West Bank Premier League
text:
The 2018–19 West Bank Premier League is the 16th season of the <a href="West%20Bank%20Premier%20League">West Bank Premier League</a>, the top <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league in the <a href="West%20Bank">West Bank</a> of <a href="State%20of%20Palestine">Palestine</a>. The season started on 30 August 2018.
Teams.
Pre-season.
A total of 12 teams compete in the league. <a href="Hilal%20Al-Quds%20Club">Hilal Al-Quds</a> are the defending champions. <a href="Shabab%20Al-Khadr%20Club">Shabab Al-Khadr</a> and <a href="Duwwara%20SC">Duwwara</a> were relegated from last season, and were replaced by promoted teams <a href="Markaz%20Shabab%20Al-Am%27ari">Markaz Shabab Al-Am'ari</a> and <a href="Markaz%20Tulkarem">Markaz Tulkarem</a>.
League table.
